name: Chess Wizards
description:
Can a single pawn of light face the armies of darkness alone? Will brain overcome the brawn? That is solely up to you. Guide the lonely pawn through the endless opposing forces.

Chess Wizards is a casual turn based strategy game with light RPG-mechanics. Earn gold and experience, level up your attributes, become the mightiest pawn there ever was! But be careful. For a fatal mistake may come at a high price.

NOTE: Android only!
